00045 #define BPMAP_FILE_HEADER_BYTES "PHT7\r\n\032\n"
00046 #define BPMAP_FILE_HEADER_LEN 8

00048 #define PM_ONLY 1
00049 #define PM_MM 0

00057 /*! The number of bytes used to store the probe sequence in the BPMAP file. */
00058 #define PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH 7
00059 
00060 /*! This class provides storage for the array information for a hit (probe or probe pair interrogating a genomic position */
00061 typedef struct _GDACSequenceHitItemType
00062 {
00063         /*! The X coordinate of the PM probe. */
00064         unsigned int    PMX;
00065 
00066         /*! The Y coordinate of the PM probe. */
00067         unsigned int    PMY;
00068 
00069         /*! The X coordinate of the MM probe. */
00070         unsigned int    MMX;
00071 
00072         /*! The Y coordinate of the MM probe. */
00073         unsigned int    MMY;
00074 
00075         /*! The match score for the PM probe. */
00076         float                   MatchScore;
00077 
00078         /*! The genomic position the probe is interrogating. */
00079         unsigned int    Position;
00080 
00081         /*! The PM probe sequence. */
00082         std::string             PMProbe;
00083 
00084         /*! The length of the PM probe. */
00085         unsigned char   ProbeLength;
00086 
00087         /*! A flag indicating if the probe is designed to interrogate the top strand.
00088          * A value of 1 indicates top, 0 indicates bottom
00089          */
00090         unsigned char   TopStrand;
00091 
00092         /*! Comparison operator used by sort */
00093         bool operator<(const _GDACSequenceHitItemType &rhs) const;
00094 
00095         /*! Packed PM probe sequence */
00096         char PackedPMProbe[PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH+1];
00097 
00098         /*! Returns the genomic position relative to the center of the probe.
00099          * @return The genomic position.
00100          */
00101         unsigned int getCenterPosition() { return Position + (ProbeLength-1)/2; }
00102 
00103         /*! Returns the genomic position relative to the start of the probe.
00104          * @return The genomic position.
00105          */
00106         unsigned int getStartPosition() { return Position; }
00107 
00108 } GDACSequenceHitItemType;
00109 
00110 /*! The size of the hit item in the BPMAP file when both PM and MM are present. */
00111 #define HIT_ITEM_SIZE_WITH_PROBE_PAIRS (4+4+4+4+1+PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH+4+4+1)
00112 
00113 /*! The size of the hit item in the BPMAP file when only PM are present. */
00114 #define HIT_ITEM_SIZE_WITH_PM_ONLY (4+4+1+PROBE_STORAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH+4+4+1)

00118 /*! This class provides storage for the probes interrogating a sequence. */
00119 class CGDACSequenceItem
00120 {
00121 public:
00122         /*! Constructor */
00123         CGDACSequenceItem();
00124 
00125         /*! Destructor */
00126         ~CGDACSequenceItem();
00127 
00128 protected:
00129         /*! The name of the sequence, e.g., chromosome. */
00130         std::string m_Name;
00131 
00132         /*! The group name for the sequence, e.g., species or organism. */
00133         std::string m_GroupName;
00134 
00135         /*! The version associated to the sequence, e.g., build version of the genomic database. */
00136         std::string m_SeqVersion;
00137 
00138         /*! The sequence id. */
00139         int m_Number;
00140 
00141         /*! Flag indicating if PM/MM pairs. */
00142         int m_ProbePairs;
00143 
00144         /* The number of probes or probe pairs (hits). */
00145         int m_NumberHits;
00146 
00147         /*! An array of hits. */
00148         std::vector<GDACSequenceHitItemType> m_Hits;
00149 
00150         /*! A pointer to the array of hits. This is used in memory mapping files. */
00151         std::vector<GDACSequenceHitItemType> *m_pHits;
00152 
00153         /*! The parameter name/value array. */
00154         TagValuePairTypeVector m_Parameters;
00155 
00156         /*! Flag indicating if the file is memory mapped. */
00157         bool m_bMapped;
00158 
00159         /*! Pointer to the memory mapped file. */
00160         char *m_lpData;
00161 
00162         /*! The file position of the start of the data. */
00163         int m_HitStartPosition;
00164 
00165         /*! Makes a copy of the object. The results are not copied to the new object, just
00166          * the pointer back to the originating object.
00167          * @param orig The object to copy.
00168          */
00169         void MakeShallowCopy(CGDACSequenceItem &orig);
00170 
00171 public:
00172         /*! Gets the sequence name.
00173          * @return The sequence name.
00174          */
00175         std::string GetName() const { return m_Name; }
00176 
00177         /*! Gets the group name.
00178          * @return The group name.
00179          */
00180         std::string GroupName() const { return m_GroupName; }
00181 
00182         /*! Returns the full name (name, group, version).
00183          * @return The full name.
00184          */
00185         std::string FullName() const;
00186 
00187         /*! Gets the version number.
00188          * @return The version number.
00189          */
00190         std::string GetSeqVersion() const { return m_SeqVersion; }
00191 
00192         /*! Gets the probe mapping type in the sequence
00193          * @return 0 if PM-MM probe pairs, 1 if PM-Only probes.
00194          */
00195         int GetProbeMapping () const { return m_ProbePairs; }
00196 
00197         /*! Gets the sequence number.
00198          * @return The sequence number.
00199          */
00200         int GetNumber() const { return m_Number; }
00201 
00202         /*! Gets the number of hits (probes or probe pairs).
00203          * @return The number of hits (probes or probe pairs).
00204          */
00205         int GetNumberHits() const { return m_NumberHits; }
00206 
00207         /*! Gets the number of tag/value parameters.
00208          * @return The number of tag/value parameters.
00209          */
00210         int GetNumberParameters() const { return (int)m_Parameters.size(); }
00211 
00212         /*! Gets the parameter at the given index.
00213          * @param index The index to the parameter array.
00214          * @return The parameter.
00215          */
00216         TagValuePairType GetParameter(int index);
00217 
00218         /*! Gets the hit data.
00219          * @param index The index to the hit of interest.
00220          * @param hit The hit (probe/probe pair) information.
00221          * @param readProbe A flag indicating if the probe sequence should be copied to the hit information.
00222          */
00223         void GetHitItem(int index, GDACSequenceHitItemType &hit, bool readProbe=false);
00224 
00225         /*! Friend to the top level class. */
00226         friend class CBPMAPFileData;
00227 };

00231 /*! This class provides storage and reading capabilities for the BPMAP file. */
00232 class CBPMAPFileData
00233 {
00234 public:
00235         /*! Constructor */
00236         CBPMAPFileData();
00237 
00238         /*! Destructor */
00239         ~CBPMAPFileData();
00240 
00241 protected:
00242         /*! The full path to the BPMAP file. */
00243         std::string m_FileName;
00244 
00245         /*! The number of sequences stored in the BPMAP file. */
00246         int      m_NumberSequences;
00247 
00248         /*! The version number of the BPMAP file. */
00249         float m_Version;
00250 
00251         /*! The file position of the start of the data. */
00252         int m_DataStartPosition;
00253 
00254         /*! A string to hold error messages. */
00255         std::string m_strError;
00256 
00257         /*! An array of sequence items - used when not  memory mapping. */
00258         std::vector<CGDACSequenceItem> m_SequenceItems;
00259 
00260         /*! Reads the file.
00261          * @param bReadHeaderOnly Flag to indicate if the header should only be read.
00262          * @return True if successful.
00263          */
00264         bool ReadFile(bool bReadHeaderOnly=false);
00265 
00266         /*! Reads the file header
00267          * @return True if successful.
00268          */
00269         bool ReadHeaderSection();
00270 
00271         /*! Reads the file data (after the header).
00272          * @return True if successful.
00273          */
00274         bool ReadDataSection();
00275 
00276         /*! Pointer to a memory mapped file. */
00277         void  *m_lpFileMap;
00278 
00279         /*! Pointer to the data in the memory mapped file. */
00280         char  *m_lpData;
00281 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00282 
00283         /*! Windows handle to the file. */
00284         HANDLE m_hFileMap;
00285 
00286         /*! Windows handle to the file. */
00287         HANDLE m_hFile;
00288 #else
00289         /*! File pointer for memory mapping. */
00290         FILE *m_fp;
00291 
00292         /*! The size of the file. */
00293         int m_MapLen;
00294 #endif
00295 
00296         /*! Flag indicating if the file is open. */
00297         bool m_bFileOpen;
00298 
00299         /*! Flag indicating if the file is memory mapped. */
00300         bool m_bFileMapped;
00301 
00302 public:
00303         /*! Sets the full path to the BPMAP file.
00304          * @param name The file name.
00305          */
00306         void SetFileName (const char *name) { m_FileName = name; }
00307 
00308         /*! Gets the full path of the file.
00309          * @return The full path of the file.
00310          */
00311         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
00312 
00313         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00314          * @return True if successful.
00315          */
00316         bool Read();
00317 
00318         /*! Reads the header of the file.
00319          * @return True if successful.
00320          */
00321         bool ReadHeader();
00322 
00323         /*! Checks if the file exists.
00324          * @return True if exists.
00325          */
00326         bool Exists();
00327 
00328         /*! Closes and deallocate memory. */
00329         void Close();
00330 
00331         /*! Gets an error string for file read errors.
00332          * @return An error string for file read errors.
00333          */
00334         std::string GetError() const { return m_strError; }
00335 
00336         /*! Gets the number of sequences stored in the BPMAP file.
00337          * @return The number of sequences stored in the BPMAP file.
00338          */
00339         int GetNumberSequences() const { return m_NumberSequences; }
00340 
00341         /*! The BPMAP file version number.
00342          * @return The BPMAP file version number.
00343          */
00344         float GetVersion() const { return m_Version; }
00345 
00346         /*! Gets the sequence data.
00347          * @param index The index to the sequence of interest.
00348          * @param seq The information about a sequence.
00349          */
00350         void GetSequenceItem(int index, CGDACSequenceItem &seq);
00351 };
